Teaching Team

Instructor

Dr. Simone Santoni

Associate Professor
Department of Management
simone.santoni@institution.edu

Office Hours: Tuesday 4:00-5:00 PM or by appointment
Office: Building TBD, Room TBD

Research Interests: Data visualization, computational social science, network analysis, organizational behavior

Background: Dr. Santoni brings extensive experience in data science and visualization to this course. His research focuses on using visual analytics to understand complex organizational and social phenomena.

Guest Speakers

Throughout the term, we’ll host industry professionals who use data visualization in their work:

3 TBD Financial Times Data Journalism & Visualization

How to Contact Us

For Questions About…

Course Content - Lecture clarifications - Concept explanations - Reading materials

→ Post on course forum or attend office hours

Assignments - Submission issues - Clarifications - Extensions

→ Email the Lead TA with instructor CC’d

Technical Issues - Software installation - Coding errors - Library problems

→ Post on forum or visit TA hours

Personal Matters - Accommodations - Extended absences - Special circumstances

→ Email instructor directly

Response Times

  • Course forum: Within 24 hours
  • Email: Within 48 hours on weekdays
  • Urgent matters: Include “URGENT” in subject line

Best Practices for Communication

  1. Check existing resources first (syllabus, FAQ, forum)
  2. Be specific in your questions
  3. Include context (assignment name, error messages, what you’ve tried)
  4. Use professional communication
  5. Plan ahead - don’t wait until the last minute

Teaching Philosophy

Our teaching team believes in:

  • Learning by doing - Hands-on practice with real data
  • Constructive feedback - Growth through iteration
  • Inclusive environment - All backgrounds and perspectives welcome
  • Real-world relevance - Connecting theory to practice
  • Student agency - You drive your own learning journey

We’re here to guide and support your learning. Don’t hesitate to reach out!
